title: Enhancing Customer Service Practical Skills: Writing-Based Learning Program for Scientific Practitioners

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can expand domain-specific knowledge related to the topic by over 20% when writing scientific argumentative essays.
Learners can systematically deconstruct complex scientific concepts and reorganize them into a logical structure of three or more levels during the explanatory writing process.
Learners can improve text quality by over 40% by revising initial drafts at least twice using peer feedback.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
